greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = 2 * a(A064989(2n-1)), a(2n-1) = 1 + (2 * a(A064989(2n-1)-1)).
comment: The even bisection halved gives A245607. The odd bisection incremented by one and halved gives A245707.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
program: A064989(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, if((2 == f[i,1]),f[i,1] = 1,f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1))); factorback(f);
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2014
